modules.description: Converts strings between different character encodings using specified input and output encodings. Operates on string-based encodings and an opaque converter type. Transcodes UTF-8 to ISO-8859-1 or similar encoding conversions in internationalized applications.

Provides functions to translate strings at runtime and extract translatable content during compilation, using localized message catalogs. Works with strings and format strings, supporting pluralization and context-specific translations. Enables output of language-specific messages, such as displaying "bonjour" for French users and "hello" for English users.

Translates strings between character encodings using a converter type, supporting conversions like UTF-8 to ISO-8859-1. Provides a core transcoding mechanism for handling internationalized text. Operations include encoding and decoding with specified character sets. Examples include converting multilingual strings for storage or transmission in different formats.
